participant_1.background:
I am a freelancer because I can choose my own hours and work from anywhere.
i didn t go to college because i run the family farm.
i am single and live alone.
My biggest fear is that my dogs will run off and get lost.
My family is very supportive of my writing.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes have a hard time relating to people who don't share my interests.
I just finished building my new gaming computer.
i am bipolar.
my best friend is in a band with me.
I love the taste of mangoes, and they are a great source of vitamins and nutrients.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing?
I am doing well, thanks for asking. How about yourself?
I am doing well too, thanks. I just finished working on a new writing project.
That's awesome! What kind of writing do you do?
I write short stories and novels. I am currently working on a fantasy novel.
That sounds really cool. I have always wanted to write a novel, but I have never had the time.
It's definitely a challenge, but it's also a lot of fun.
I can imagine. Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes, I love to play video games and I also love to cook.
That's cool. I love to play video games too. What are some of your favorite games?
I love playing RPGs, like the Elder Scrolls series and the Witcher series.
Those are both great games. I also love playing RPGs.
It's nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
You too. It's nice to talk to someone who understands my gaming addiction.
